Most Illustrious Excellent Sir

I inform Your Excellency of the Jacuí river commanded by Corporal Joaquim Rodrigues, having the plan failed because the rebel Manuel Alz. marched with all his forces to the shore of the Jacuí river.

The rebel José Romão Taborda, arrested in the previous sortie, was delivered by order of Your Excellency.

God keep Your Excellency Most Illustrious Excellent Sir Tomás José da Silva. Marshal and Commander of the Garrison of Porto Alegre. Barracks in the village of Triunfo, February 16, 1845. Antônio Pedro de Abreu Major in charge of gathering the ranks of the 8th Brigade.
